segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on drying that plate, as if nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just cascading over the edge of the sink, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, grabbing cookies while she’s distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the boy is balancing on that stool, reaching as high as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is going to be flooded if someone doesn’t turn off the water soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be in for a big surprise when she finally looks down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm garden outside and the mess inside is almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at the children’s cleverness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is like a snapshot of pure, innocent mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
